info.description: REST API for OpenVPN user, group, and network management
info.title: OpenVPN Manager API

get.description: Get a paginated list of audit logs (ADMIN only)

parameters.description: Filter by action (CREATE, READ, UPDATE, DELETE, LOGIN, LOGOUT)
parameters.name: action

get.description: Get list of all available audit actions (ADMIN only)
Get list of all entity types that have been logged (ADMIN only)
Get audit logs for a specific entity (ADMIN only)
Get audit log statistics (ADMIN only)
Get audit logs for a specific user (ADMIN only)
Get an audit log by ID (ADMIN only)

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token

get.description: Get the currently authenticated user
List groups with pagination
Get a group by ID
Get networks assigned to a group

post.description: Add a network to a group (Admin only)

delete.description: Remove a network from a group (Admin only)

get.description: Get users in a group. Admin sees all. Manager sees only subordinates in the group. User sees only themselves if member.

post.description: Add a user to a group. Admin can add anyone. Manager can only add their subordinates.

delete.description: Remove a user from a group. Admin can remove anyone. Manager can only remove their subordinates.

get.description: List networks with pagination (Admin only)
Get a network by ID (Admin only)
Get all groups assigned to a network (Admin only)

post.description: Add a group to a network (Admin only)

delete.description: Remove a group from a network (Admin only)

get.description: List users with pagination. Admin sees all users. Manager sees only subordinates. User sees only themselves.

post.description: Create a new user (Admin or Manager). Managers can only create users assigned to themselves.

get.description: Get a user by ID

put.description: Update a user. Admin can update anyone. Manager can update their subordinates. User cannot use this endpoint.

get.description: Get all groups a user belongs to with their networks

post.description: Add a user to a group

delete.description: Remove a user from a group

post.description: Authenticate a user for VPN connection (called by OpenVPN auth-user-pass-verify script)
Create a new VPN session (called by OpenVPN client-connect script)

put.description: Update a VPN session with disconnect info (called by OpenVPN client-disconnect script)

get.description: Get a list of all active users for VPN (used for firewall rules generation)
Get user details by username for VPN (called by OpenVPN scripts)
Get user details by ID for VPN (called by OpenVPN scripts)
Get network routes for a user based on their group memberships (called by OpenVPN client-connect script)
Get a paginated list of VPN sessions (ADMIN only)

post.description: Create a new VPN session (called by VPN server)

get.description: Get all currently active VPN sessions (ADMIN only)
Get a VPN session by ID (ADMIN only)

put.description: Update a VPN session with disconnect info (called by VPN server)

get.description: Get aggregated VPN usage statistics (ADMIN only)
Get VPN usage statistics aggregated per user (ADMIN only)
get.summary: Get VPN usage statistics per user

get.description: Get a paginated list of traffic stats (ADMIN only)

post.description: Create a new traffic stats entry (called by VPN server)

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token. Example: "Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIs..."
BearerAuth.name: Authorization

VpnToken.description: VPN server authentication token configured in API settings
VpnToken.name: X-VPN-Token
